title: Reward!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>The weather is so nice today, isn’t it, Nozomi-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, you’re right. Though, are you okay with spending such beautiful weather helping on a shrine? It’s a great help to me, but don’t you want to go out and play?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s fine, we owe a lot to this place, so I kind of want to give my thanks~. Plus, I’m with you, Nozomi-chan, so it’s fun to help out.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You’re such a good girl, Hanayo-chan. I’m sure the gods will want to reward you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ahaha, the fact that we’re able to have fun doing our activities as μ’s is enough reward for me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Then maybe I should give you a reward too♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeh!? From you, Nozomi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>It’s a bit of a walk, but there’s a lovely coffee shop over there, they have these reaaally thick pancakes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I-, I’d like to try that~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, let’s go drink some melon sodas too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
